"""
The temporal mean summary statistic
"""

# Imports
import numpy as np
from mio.utilities.summarystats.summary_base import SummaryBase


# Class definition: Temporal Mean Statistic

[docs]class TemporalMean(SummaryBase):
    """
    Simply the mean taken over the entire time span
    """

    def __init__(self, mean_trajectories=True):
        self.name = 'TemporalMean'
        super(TemporalMean, self).__init__(self.name, mean_trajectories)


[docs]    def compute(self, data):
        """
        Calculate the value(s) of the summary statistic(s)
        :param data: simulated or data set
        :return: computed statistic value
        """
        if self.mean_trajectories:
            return np.asarray(np.mean(np.mean(data, axis=1), axis=0)).reshape(1, 1)
        else:
            return np.asarray(np.mean(data, axis=1)).reshape(1, 1)
